about_the_game:
Easy Sketch Pose is a human posing and drawing all-in-one app designed for people who want to draw with good 3d reference for anatomy and perspective.
Pose characters and static objects in the 3d layer and draw in 2d layers over the perfectly posed character with easy to use controls and seamless switching between 2d and layers.

SETUP COMPLEX LAYOUTS

Setup complex layouts easily by importing in external OBJ and animated FBX files, changing lighting and using different visual modes to get a wide variety of looks.
Play with light and shadows to get beautiful compositions, add a wide variety of hundreds of bundled 3d models from airplanes to buildings for complex scenes.

ENHANCED BRUSHES

Pressure, smoothness and transparency based brush with full sensitivity control.
"Hook" brush for creating guided strokes easily and intuitively.

ANATOMICALLY ACCURATE MODELS

2 new anatomically accurate models added with color groups for sets of muscles.
Pose the new male and female models with an accurate deformations and proportions

POSE AND DRAW

Have you ever wanted a professional model who would perform a variety of poses to make drawing animation, illustrations, and sketching easier? By manipulating the 3D model on the screen, you can create poses seen in everyday life, sports, martial arts, etc., and then draw on a seperate layer for getting the right proportions and perspective.

IMPORT 3D MESHES

Add background details easily by importing in .OBJ files and .FBX files into the 3D layer and merge it seamlessly into the main 2D scene.
Use the inbuilt models of 3d cities, vehicles, trees,interiors and hundreds of props to add complexity to your compositions.

PRECISE BRUSH CONTROL

Easily control brush curves,smoothness and thick/thin with 3 simple controls.
"Catch up" controls on the brush allows precise drawing curve control with beautiful lines.
Pressure sensitivity and Windows Ink compatibility fully supported on Wacom/Huion/Xppen tablets.

DIFFERENT VISUAL STYLES

Switch between grayscale,black white outline and grayscale toon shading in the 3D scene
Snapshot and integrate 3D scenes seamlessly into a 2D layer for an seamless 2d/3d look.

FEATURES

*Seamlessy add 2d layers so that you can paint non-destructively with a pen tablet w/ pressure control.

*Save,load and export 3D poses for all 7 characters bundled ranging from realistic male to anime girl.

*An innovative hand editor allows users to get precise hand poses whilst intuitive camera controls lets users easily setup complex 3D scenes.

*Export out layers as .PNG files ,so users can preserve details in layers and making color separation easy.

*Import in external 3D meshes using the .OBJ format or .FBX formats to easily add background details.FBX animations can be scrubbed frame by frame.

*Hundreds of models of buildings, cities ,vehicles, trees, furniture, interior scenes, crowds and geometric primitives are bundled in the app for fast layouts.

*Intuitive controllers and transform manipulators allows users to easily pose their characters in 3d space.

*Layer control allows users to add multiple transparent 2d layers on the existing 3d layer.

*You can load in a total of 7 different characters ranging from normal proportions to stylized anime in order to get the right body shape and style.

*Control lighting and shading modes so you can switch between looks like toon shaded and black/white noir easily.

*Smooth brush and pressure sliders with catch up functionality makes inking easy.

EXAMPLE SCENES

Pose characters and static objects in the 3d layer and draw in 2d layers over the perfectly posed character with easy to use controls and seamless switching between 2d and layers.

name: Easy Sketch Pose

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB Onboard Memory
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Wacom and Huion tablets for maximum control

short_description: Pose characters and static objects in the 3D layer and draw in 2D over the posed character with easy to use controls and features. Setup complex 3d scenes with full lighting and different visual looks. Output out layers as seperate PNG files for use in other art packages for fast workflow.
